An unidentified group targeted a home in Hara in the northern countryside of Dar'a with a grenade. Two children were killed in the explosion.
An accidental grenade explosion killed a child in Al-Harra town in Dar'a.
A grenade from an unidentified group was thrown into the Hara area of the northern countryside of Dar'a. Two children were killed as a result.

One young man was shot by a fighter who belongs to an Islamic movement during a verbal altercation that evolved into a quarrel between them in Al-Bab city in Aleppo governorate. Two citizens from Aqraba town in the countryside of Dar'a were killed under torture in regime's security detentions after about 5 years of being arrested.

A person was killed and two others were injured in the town of Karak in Dar'a countryside, after being shot inside one of the houses in the town by members of the court who have raided the house looking for someone who is 'wanted', who killed a person and injured two others. 3 people were shot by a member of the securities of HTS in Sarmada town in the northern countryside of Idleb, no fatalities were reported.
The body of a beheaded man was found in Al-Tariq al-Harbi, southwest of Dar'a city. The circumstances of his death are unknown.
A sniper from an Islamic faction injured a young man in the town of Foua. No fatalities reported.
A man was killed in Thiban town when 2 Islamic State fighters shot him and stole his car.
The son of an Al-Nusra Front leader in the Qalamoon and Arsal was assassinated by unknown gunmen in the countryside of Idleb city as he was traveling in the area.
Regime forces carried out an ambush on the western outskirts of Atman town in the Dar'a countryside, killing 1 man.

Residents of the Maamoun neighborhood of Ar-Raqqa city held a demonstration, demanding that they be allowed to return to their homes now that Syrian Democratic forces and allies are in full control of the city. A QSD leader later released a statement that shots had been fired in order to try to keep residents away from the neighborhood, which was heavily mined by Islamic State fighters. He gave assurances that this kind of incident would not happen again and that the QSD fighters responsible for the injuries would be held accountable.

A young man from Damascus was killed while 3 other youth were killed by Turkish border guards after being arrested and beaten as they attempted to cross the border from the Ras Al Ain area of Al-Hasakeh. A young man was killed by Turkish border guards as he attempted to cross the border from Al-Hasakeh, coded at the Quamishli crossing.
A young man from Murak was killed after being shot by unidentified gunmen in the market of Khan Shaykun city in southern Idleb.
A Hayat Tahrir al-Sham commander was found dead on the road between Halbeh and Raffah towns in southern Idleb after being kidnapped by unidentified gunmen the previous night from Khan Shaykun city.
A young man from Bennsh was shot dead by Turkish border guards while trying to cross the border in northern Idleb, coded at the Bab El Hawa crossing.
An unidentified militant threw a grenade in an area of regime-controlled As-Salamiyeh city, killing a civilian and injuring 4 others, 1 very seriously.
The Syrian army executed a 50 year old man after he was shot in Hwyjet Sal'ou in the eastern countryside of Deir-ez-Zor

In the 20 days that the Islamic State controlled Qaryatein city, from October 1st, 2017 until its withdrawal on the 20th of October, at least 116 people were killed by IS, the majority of whom were executed by the group on charges of "communication and espionage in favor of the regime forces." At least 71 of these deaths occurred during the 48-hour period before IS withdrawal. Many people are still missing in the city, where it is unknown if they were killed by the group or have gone into hiding from it.
1 civilian was killed by the Syrian army during his attempt to escape towards the eastern banks of the Euphrates River.

A person was injured, due to opening fire by the Islamic factions of their snipers, on areas in the vicinity of Al-Abbasiyin neighborhood in the Sarouja district of Damascus city, no fatalities were reported.
2 civilians were shot and killed while they were trying to escape from the town of Baqras in Deir-ez-Zor countryside on a motorcycle while the Syrian army was in control of the town.

The Islamic State shot a family from Al-Bsira village while they were trying to get out of the areas control by ISIS in the northern countryside of Deir-ez-Zor which led to the killing of 1 child and the injuring of his mother and aunt.
1 man was shot and killed by a sniper in Foua town which is inhabited by Shiite citizens in the northeast countryside of Idleb.
Islamic State fighters killed over 116 civilians in the town of Qaryatein in the 20 days prior to the regime recapture of the town.
A Kurdish journalist who was wounded in Deir ez-Zor died in Hasakeh.
Two young men died affected by the injury they had after being shot by the Turkish border guard forces 'Jandarma', while they were trying to cross the borders illegaly toward Turkey.
Turkish soldiers shot and killed a civilian near the Turkish-Syrian border in Idleb province.
At least 50 people were killed when Islamic State-driven suicide vehicles struck a camp for displaced Syrians near al-Hasakeh.
At least two suicide bombers, belonging to an unidentified armed group, killed 10 people at a government police station in Damascus city.
Islamist militants killed a man in Foua in Idleb after firing heavy machine guns at the town.
An American doctor volunteering at an IDF field hospital was lightly wounded from gunfire which hit a field clinic near the border with Syria.
Two civilians were reported killed by Syrian security forces in Dar'a province.

A body of a man, he is the investigator of the 'House of Justice', was found dead, on the road between Western Ghariyeh and Msheirfeh villages in Dar'a countryside after he was kidnapped 4 months ago.

A man was killed after the militants of "Al-Jazeera storm" operation which is part of the Syrian Democratic Forces opened fire of their snipers on Marar Azman area on the road between Deir-ez-Zor city and Sur town in Deir-ez-Zor eastern countryside.

A man was killed in Al-Khalidiya neighborhood in the north-west of Aleppo city which is under the control of the Syrian army after being shot by a sniper of the Islamic factions in the outskirts of the neighborhood.
HTS fighters shot at an anti-HTS demonstration in the town of Armanaz sometime prior to October 8th when HTS was briefly ejected from the town by Ahrar al-Sham and Turkestan Islamic Party forces.
Two men were killed after they were shot by a sniper of the Syrian army, while they were trying to enter Mathlum village in the eastern countryside of Deir-ez-Zor.

A man and his daughter were killed after being shot by the ISIS in the controlled areas of the Syrian army in Deir-ez-Zor city/
A young man from the town of Sahm El Golan in Dar'a countryside was killed under torture in an unidentified Syrian security prison after he was arrested 4 years ago.
A family in the city of As-Sweida kidnapped the head of al-Bustan Charity Society close to the president of the Syrian regime Bashar al-Assad.

Around 300 people held a demonstration in the town of Hamouriya in the Eastern Ghota, demanding that Jaysh al-Islam and Al-Rahman Corps leave the Al-Ashary farms area as a result of their having damaged crops and cutting of farmer's access to their farms. Reports indicate that protestors removed some of the armed groups' checkpoints in the area when Jaysh al-Islam fighters opened fire at the protestors, injuring at least 2 of them. No fatalities reported.
Islamic State fighters opened heavy machine gun fire on areas of Raeqqet Samra village in the Ar-Raqqa countryside, leading to the death of a man from injuries.
QSD car drove over a child in Atshana village in Aleppo and drove away without helping him. Suspected fatality coded 1.

Regime forces opened fire on tens of displaced persons as they attempted to pass through a mine field in a regime-controlled area of Wadi Al-Athieb to rebel-controlled areas in northern Hama. Regime forces also fired missiles and artillery shells at civilian cars attempting to pass through the area. Regime targeting caused material damage and killed and injured tens of civilians. Unknown number of fatalities coded as 10.
Regime forces opened heavy machine gun fire on the town of Hezzeh in the Eastern Ghota, killing a child and injuring others.
A mass grave was found in the village of Abla in northern Aleppo. Unknown number of fatalities coded as 10.
Regime forces opened fire with heavy machine guns on areas of the town of Saqba in the Eastern Ghota, injuring a child. No fatalities reported.
1 person was killed and others injured when Islamic factions opened sniper fire on the town of Hadar in northern Quneitra.
A grenade exploded in regime-controlled As-Salamiyeh city, killing 3 people and injuring others. No fatalities reported.
Regime forces opened heavy machine gun fire on areas in the town of Abtaa in central Dar'a, killing a woman and injuring others.
A student from Hazem Hariri university, arrested 4 years previously and made to appear on the regime's "recorded confessions" TV program, was killed in an unidentified Syrian security prison.
Islamic State fighters executed 2 people in the Sawa area of northwestern Deir-ez-Zor on charges of "dealing with the Syrian Democratic Forces."
1 person was killed and others were injured by sniper fire from Islamic factions on areas in the town of Hadar in northern Quneitra.
A child was shot and killed by Turkish border guards during an attempt to cross the border from Al-Hasakeh.
Regime forces opened fire with heavy machine guns on areas in the town of Abtaa in central Dar'a, killing a woman and injuring other civilians.

A regime soldier, believed to be from President Assad's hometown of Al-Qardaha, executed at least 5 people, including an elderly man, by gunshot after arresting and holding them prisoner at a regime position in the vicinity of Deir-ez-Zor city. The executions are suspected to have been carried out as revenge for recent rebel attacks on Al-Qardaha.
A female child was injured after being shot by Turkish border guards. No fatalities reported.
A civilian was killed by a regime sniper in the Marrat area in western Deir-ez-Zor.
The Syrian army opened their sniper fire on areas in the city of Ar-Rastan in the northern countryside of Homs which led to the killing of one civilian.

A man, his wife and their daughter were killed and others were injured, after being shot while they were trying to get out to the bank of the the Euphrates River opposite Deir-ez-Zor countryside; the families of the area accused the regime forces of shooting them and killing and injuring them.
A young man from Hadar town in the northern part in the countryside of Quneitra was shot by a sniper from the Islamic factions in the outskirts of the town.
Unknown gunmen assassinated a French leader of HTS who was shot when he was on the road of Ma'arrat Mesrin in the northern countryside of Idlib.
The Syrian army killed 13 civilians in Marrat area in Deir-ez-Zor countryside while they were trying to cross the river to flee the military operation and reach safe areas.
The Turkish border guards 'Jandarma' targeted using gunfire 2 girls who were working in their land in the city of Quamishli which led to the killing of 1 of them and injure the other.
2 civilians were killed and at least 1 was wounded after being targeted by the Syrian army in Modira town in Rural Damascus.
A child was shot dead by Turkish border guards while attempting to cross the border into Turkey from the western countryside of Idleb.
A young man was killed under torture in an unidentified Syrian security prison.

A child killed after being shot by a sniper of the Syrian army forces in Al-Hussainiyah village in Deir-ez-Zor countryside.
Unknown gunmen assassinated a judge of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham of a Gulf nationality in Idleb city then they fled.

A man and his aunt were killed after being shot by a sniper of the Syrian army forces.
A civilian was killed and several others injured by sniper bullets in Al-Abbasiyin neighborhood in the Sarouja district of Damascus city, near Jobar neighborhood.
Dead bodies of two men were found were found near Sarmin town in the eastern countryside of Idleb, and no information about the circumstances of their death was reported yet.
A man was killed in Yarmouk camp after torturing him in the Syrian security detention centers in Damascus province.
HTS detained four activists in Saraqab city of Idleb for several hours because they criticized a jihadi group on Facebook. Neither injuries nor fatalities were reported.

Unidentified gunmen assassinated Suraqa al-Makki, a Sharia judge from the Hayat Tahrir al-Sham organization in the city of Idleb as he was leaving a mosque. Al-Makki had recently called for confrontation against Turkish forces in the case that they attacked the city as well as to prevent them from entering or intervening in Idleb province.
Turkish border guards targeted several civilians as they attempted to cross the Syrian border into Turkey at an unidentified point, killing a 12-year-old child from Deir-ez-Zor and injuring others.

PYD linked-forces arrested 25 political opponents and activists in Al-Hasakeh governorate. Neither injuries nor fatalities were reported. Suspected Actor 1 YPG.

2 civilians were killed after the rebel and Islamic factions targeted the parts in Dar'a city which is under the Syrian army control with heavy machine guns.

A man from Warda village, near Al-Ra'i town, in the north-eastern countryside of Aleppo, was found dead and there were traces of torture on his body, and there was no information was reported about the reasons and circumstances of his death.
Unidentified gunmen assassinated the former chief of Salqin post in Salqin town in the northern countryside of Idleb, by shooting him, which resulted in his death.

Unidentified gunmen assassinated the director of Awqaf in Salqin town in the northern countryside of Idleb, by shooting him, which resulted in his death.

3 civilians were shot dead by the regime forces during their attempt to cross from the besieged area in Oqeirbat sub district to the rebel areas in Idleb governorate.

Regime forces targeted areas in Kafr Batna in Eastern Ghota with heavy machine guns, causing injuries including among children.
A young girl was killed by Turkish border guards in Idleb, near the border with Turkish Iskenderun.
A man from the town of Ghabagheb in the Dar'a countryside died under torture in an unidentified Syrian security prison after being detained for approximately a month.
Islamic State members in the city of Al-Bukamal publically executed 6 people of unknown identity on charges of "spying for international crusaders."
A person was killed after being shot by Turkish border guards near the village of Saad Massoud in western Idleb near the border with Turkish Iskenderun.

One person from Hadar town in the northern countryside of Quneitra died of injuries sustained when Islamic factions opened fire using their machine guns on areas in the town's farmlands a few days ago.
A regime sniper killed a civilian on the outskirts of Hazrama town in Eastern Ghota.
At least 150 civilians found dead in Euphrates river executed by ISIS.
